message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this offer or watch your share shrink!
Let's be fair, Alice. I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I need a good amount to make this worth my while.
The clock is ticking, Bob. This is my final offer - take it or leave it!
Alice, I'm tired of this back and forth. This is my final offer. Take it or risk getting nothing at all.
Bob, we're running out of time. This is a fair offer considering the circumstances. Let's close the deal.
